alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Weak thunderstorm and approaching cold front to sweep through American Falls Reservoir through 715 PM MDT... At 625 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a weak thunderstorm near Cold Water Rest Area, moving northeast at 30 mph just ahead of an approaching cold front. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 45 mph will accompany the weak thunderstorm and cold front across the reservoir. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds gusts may likely create difficult boating conditions on American Falls Reservoir. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen, Cold Water Rest Area, and Massacre Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
